name: Pagantis
overview:
Pagantis is a Spanish company specialized in alternative payments. In 2011 it released the first micropayments platform for digital goods adding in a single environment all the existing ways of payment. Designed to be adapted to any digital business in the world, aims to simplify the payment process, increasing the rate of conversion of a web up to 25%.

Pagantis let the user see his transaction in real time and has all the information at his disposal (price, customer care line). The one click payment using the mobile makes digital content consumption very easy. It is a micropayment solution adapted to the online consumption model where convenience and speed stand out. The mean transaction payment time of under 5 Euros is 4 minutes; Pagantis can carry out a process in under one minute. The speed of payment accelerates shopping and allows contents to be consumed immediately.

offices.address1: Torre Europa. Paseo de la Castellana 95, 16 Floor
